sentences.en: A nap is a tempting idea.
sentences.cn: 睡一会午觉这主意很不错.

sentences.en: As soon as you start to talk about never having played on a losing side, it is tempting fate.
sentences.cn: 你刚说从来没输过，晦气就来了。

sentences.en: At first glance, it would be tempting to agree.
sentences.cn: 乍一看，会让人很想同意。

sentences.en: He was tempting me, baiting me.
sentences.cn: 他在引诱我, 让我上钩.

sentences.en: I made him what I thought were several tempting offers, but he wouldn't bite.
sentences.cn: 我向他提出一些自以为动听的建议, 但他不肯上钩.

sentences.en: In the end, I turned down Raoul's tempting offer of the Palm Beach trip.
sentences.cn: 最终，我回绝了拉乌尔提出的去棕榈海滩旅行的诱人邀请。

sentences.en: It has always been tempting for humans to mythologize snakes.
sentences.cn: 写有关蛇的神话是令人感兴趣的.

sentences.en: It is tempting Providence to go in that old boat.
sentences.cn: 乘那艘旧船前往是冒大险.

sentences.en: It is tempting to idealize the past.
sentences.cn: 人都爱把过去的日子说得那么美好。

sentences.en: It will be particularly tempting if prices keep falling.
sentences.cn: 如果油价继续下跌,前景将相当吸引人注意.

sentences.en: It's tempting Providence to go in that old boat.
sentences.cn: 乘那艘旧船出航真是冒险.

sentences.en: Some of these offers were very tempting, but I had trouble taking them seriously.
sentences.cn: 这些邀请之中,有的待遇相当高, 可是我很难对这些聘请给予认真考虑.

sentences.en: Wealthy tourists are tempting targets for bag snatchers.
sentences.cn: 富有的游客很容易成为抢包贼的目标。

sentences.en: You can catch these insects by tempting them to fly into a trap.
sentences.cn: 你可以引诱这些昆虫飞进罗网从而捉住它们.

words.tran_cn: 诱惑；引起；冒…的风险；使感兴趣

trans.tran_en: something that is tempting seems very good and you would like to have it or do it

trans.tran_cn: 引诱或怂恿（某人）干不正当的事( tempt的现在分词)
